resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75119</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aec-1bd4-4268-2d50-d7debd6cc8f7#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szent Mihály-evangeliarium fedele.</string>
            <string language="en">The cover of the Saint Michael's Evangeliary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abdeckung des Heiliger Michaels des 
Evangeliary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La couverture de l'Evangeliary de Saint Michael</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A tampa do Evangeliary de Saint Michael</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Copertura del Evangeliary del San il Michael</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κάλυψη του Evangeliary Αγίου michael</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cubierta del Evangeliary de Santo Michael</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Szent Mihály arkangyal ábrázolása körül filigrándíszes keretben, mandorlákban elhelyetett apostol-képek</string>
            <string language="en">Apostle-pictures around the Saint Michael archangel’s representing filigree ornamented frame (mandorla)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  honfoglalás kor,  palmetta,  Attila kardja,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, Hungarian settlement era, palmette, Attila's sword</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Apostel-Abbildungen um die Heiliger Michael 
archangel?s, die mit Filigran geschmücktes verziertes Feld (mandorla)
darstellen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apôtre-images autour de l'archange de Saint 
Michael représentant la trame ornementée en filigrane (mandorla)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apostle-retratos em torno dos archangel?s de 
Saint Michael que representam o frame ornamented filigree (mandorla)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Apostle-immagini intorno ai archangel?s del San 
Michael che rappresentano struttura ornata a filigrana (mandorla)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόστολος-εικόνες γύρω από τον Αγιο michael 
archangel?s που αντιπροσωπεύει το filigree διακοσμημένο 
πλαίσιο (mandorla)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Apostle-cuadros alrededor de los archangel?s de 
Santo Michael que representan el marco adornado afiligranado 
(mandorla)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, ungarische Regelung Ära, 
palmette, Klinge Attilas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, ère hongroise de règlement, 
palmette, l'épée d'Attila</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, era hungarian do estabelecimento, 
palmette, espada de Attila</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, era ungherese di stabilimento, 
palmette, spada del Attila</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη χρυσοχόου, ουγγρική εποχή τακτοποίησης, palmette, 
ξίφος Attila</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, era húngara del establecimiento, 
palmette, espada de Attila</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
